statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_title, amendment_description FROM legislative_bills WHERE amendment_id = 123;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT amendment_id, amendment_date FROM legislative_bills WHERE amendment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND amendment_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT bill_title, amendment_description FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_title LIKE '%health%' AND amendment_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY bill_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE amendment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
SELECT bill_id, amendment_description FROM legislative_bills WHERE amendment_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title, amendment_date FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_number, amendment_text FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_number > 100;
SELECT * FROM bill_history WHERE amendment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_id, amendment_description FROM bill_history WHERE amendment_description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT bill_number, amendment_date FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_number > 100 ORDER BY bill_number DESC;
SELECT bill_id, amendment_text FROM legislative_bills WHERE amendment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amendment_date ASC;
SELECT lb.bill_id, bh.amendment_description FROM legislative_bills lb JOIN bill_history bh ON lb.bill_id = bh.bill_id ORDER BY lb.bill_number ASC, bh.amendment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_number BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY bill_number ASC, amendment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT lb.bill_id, lb.bill_number FROM legislative_bills lb JOIN bill_history bh ON lb.bill_id = bh.bill_id ORDER BY lb.bill_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM bill_history;
SELECT bill_id, amendment_date FROM bill_history ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
SELECT bill_id, amendment_id, amendment_description FROM bill_history WHERE bill_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_title LIKE '%health%';
SELECT amendment_number, amendment_text, amendment_author FROM amendments ORDER BY amendment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_history WHERE amendment_id = 1234 AND amendment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_title, bill_sponsor FROM bills WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT amendment_number, amendment_text FROM amendments WHERE amendment_author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY amendment_date ASC;
SELECT bill_number, bill_title, bill_sponsor FROM bills INNER JOIN bill_history ON bills.id = bill_history.bill_id WHERE bill_history.amendment_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_sponsor LIKE '%Smith%' AND bill_number LIKE 'HR%' ORDER BY bill_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT amendment_description, amendment_date FROM amendments WHERE amendment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM bill_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_id = 123;
SELECT bill_title, amendment_history FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_title LIKE '%tax%' ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND legislator_id > 1000 ORDER BY legislator_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM bill_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY category_id;
SELECT amendment_description, amendment_date FROM amendments WHERE amendment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bills;
SELECT bill_name, amendment_count FROM Bills;
SELECT bill_name, date_proposed FROM Bills ORDER BY date_proposed DESC;
SELECT amendment_text FROM Amendments WHERE bill_id = 3;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Bills;
SELECT bill_name, date_proposed FROM Bills ORDER BY date_proposed DESC;
SELECT a.amendment_text, b.bill_name FROM Amendments a JOIN Bills b ON a.bill_id = b.bill_id WHERE a.amendment_count > 5;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Authors WHERE author_id IN (SELECT author_id FROM Amendments GROUP BY author_id);
SELECT v.voter_id, b.bill_name, v.vote_status FROM Votes v JOIN Bills b ON v.bill_id = b.bill_id WHERE v.vote_status='Yes';
